title: Cheesy Chicken Taco Casserole
directions: Season chicken with seasonings and cook thoroughly in skillet with a little olive oil.
While chicken is cooking, dice cilantro and onion and combine in bowl.
After ten minutes, remove and shred chicken small enough to make 3 cups.
Preheat oven to 400Â° and cook cilantro/onion mix in skillet until onions are translucent [about 3-4 minutes]
Spread 1/3 of sauce over bottom of a 8 by 8 baking dish.
Arrange 3 tortillas slightly overlapping on top [like lasagna]
Sprinkle 1/3 of chicken and cilantro over tortillas, then cheese.
Repeat with two more layers ending with cheese.
Arrange tomato on final layer of cheese, cover with foil, and bake for 20 minutes.
Remove foil and cook an additional 10 minutes or until top is lightly browned.
ingredients: 2 cups shredded cheddar or Monterey jack cheese
